metadata.title: CVE-2021-45472 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MediaWiki through 1.37, XSS can occur in Wikibase because an externalidentifier property can have a URL format that includes a $1 formattersubstitution marker, and the javascript: URL scheme (among others) can beused.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
